segments.text: I'd like you to bring me some food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please send up a bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Regrettably , we're currently out of filet mignon . May I suggest the porterhouse instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you be interested in chocolate-covered strawberries with the champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd love to , but I'm allergic to strawberries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , no strawberries tonight . The items will be charged to your amenities account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our staff will bring you your order in as short a time as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
